judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellant to pay costs.
Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Zimmer v. Zimmerman, Appellant.
Argued September 26, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Allen T. Lame, with him Robert E. Waymam, James A. Bemkemper, and Waymam, Irvin, Trushel & Mc-Auley, for appellant.
Michael Hahalyah, with him Donald 8. Little, for appellee.
November 26, 1973:
